In India there is an enormous gap between healthcare supply and demand. What do you think are the major steps that can be taken by the government to improve patient care in the country?

  Health care plays a predominant role.  Health care refers to the care taken for the patients. basically health care determines the main stream of hospitals, hospital Ambience, reception, their staff and facilities provided,billing, advices and guidances, room facility, security and basic amenities with minimum neat cafeteria and canteen facilities etc.,

 Basically in India  most of the hospitals offers these facilities but with varied fees structure which can't be bared by the most of the middle class families. previously in olden days hospitals are with minimum facilities are used to offered.but day by day with the upgradation of technology,expansion and innovative methods are coming into progress and with new-new facilities which brings most of the people attention towards those types of hospitals to opt among the various hospitals.mainly people are getting attracted towards ambience,reception, their staff and facilities provided,billing, advices and guidances,room facility,security and basic amenities with minimum neat and cafeteria and canteen facilities. In India even companies are offering many insurance facilities,medi-claim facilities,maternal for may be 3 months and paternal  for one month ,leave,sick leave facility. even companies are offering many employee benefits such as disability income facility,insurance facility,and even on behalf of the companies employees can claim money and they can get discounts.even employees can get benefitted even after retirement.after retirement they can get monthly medicines,and even checkups .According to Economics as the Demand increases, Supply increases.but in Health care services their is an enormous gap between Health care Supply and Demand,especially in India.in many of the other countries offer many medi-claim facilities and their main focus is on providing enormous benefits to patients where they can acquire full satisfaction and feel friendly approach.so, that they can expose to get cleared to many of their doubts,and can get willingly to come again and again.Health care plays a predominant role.But in India, even though  health care supply is increasing the demand is not in the same pace.I think government has to take some particular steps to transform and to enhance,build,expand health care facilities.so that  it can lead to reduce the gap between the health care supply and demand. These steps can improve the patient care in India.

1.Government can develop most of well renowed and mostly reputed hospitals with most professional and efficient doctors and even with staff.

2.Government have to provide all the proper information through all the type of channels such as media,newspapers , and even radios,T.V,advertisements through hoardings,proper information centers et., so that information,facilities offered  can be reached by the most of the people and people and needy can utilise these opputunities.

3.Government can improve patient care by offering  a friendly environment to get the information needed to patients without hesitation and can feel "they come to a right place".

4.Government should enhance the hospitals with world class facilities .But neat and clean surroundings are to be maintained.why because, minimum clean environment should be maintained which attracts many of the patients to opt .

5.Doctors can transform their skills.as many of the most efficient doctors after completing their medicine they are moving to abroad for better pay.so government can utilise those efficient doctors,full fedged experts and are to be used in india.so their excellence can be used and utilised and dedicated to work in india with equivalent pays as in abroad.so needy patients can get cured and diagnosed .Doctors has to treat patients with a lot of Preservance .

6.Government has to improve the patient care by providing proper check-ups and without any bias between the common man and VIP's. These  type of honest environment attracts many of the people to choose and to utilise services. mainly proper care should be taken as and only when patients are satisfied. when patients get satisfied with their services ,then only these type of services get popular and got reputed through proper channels.in this way government can reduce gap between healthcare supply and demand.

conclusion: Government can reduce gap between healthcare supply and demand as health care services plays major role.Government have to provide all the proper information through all the type of channels.so, needy patients can get cured and diagnosed .Doctors has to treat patients with a lot of Preservance as it improves the patient care  .Minimium clean environment should be maintained which attracts many of the patients to opt .Government should enhance the hospitals with world class facilities.
